name: sifh
description:
Note: Play the game in fullscreen for intended experience! 

sifhA game by Svante Krusberg and Elinor Selinder

Play the roll of a fisher, who's just out on another day at sea. Unbeknownst to the fisher, the world begins its decent into chaos. The water and sky takes on a reddish hue and the fish begin talking to the angler, offering strange deals.. 

You have 13 hours left to live, so use them wisely and try to catch as much demon fish as you can! Try to get the highest score possible in: sifh, before either your life or the world ends.

We hope that you enjoy this game that was created in 4 days for the Juice Jam II!!
